snippet: Chris Baker, a tugboat captain on Staten Island for McAllister Towing, captures in photos what goes on behind the scenes.
abstract: Chris Baker, tugboat captain on Staten Island for McAllister Towing, describes his love of both photography and boats; several photos Baker took while on the water are highlighted.
lead_paragraph: Chris Baker, a tugboat captain on Staten Island for McAllister Towing, captures in photos what goes on behind the scenes.
